articles.description: Apple's next iOS update should make it a lot easier to unlock your iPhone while wearing a mask. There's just one caveat.
articles.content:
On the grand list of First World problems, not being able to unlock your iPhone with Face ID while wearing a mask is undoubtedly at the top.
That said, come on, its pretty annoying. And I, along wit… [+3039 chars]
